title: The Too Short Interview: The E-40 Battle, Women in Rap, New Business with Snoop & Cube
description:
Too Short is back on No Jumper to talk about his business ventures with Snoop, Ice Cube and E40 and how he still makes money after being in the game for over 40 years!
